00035 CStyle::Format::Format(const CStyle::StyleType type) : m_frame(0), m_type(type) {
00036     clearData();
00037 }
00038 
00039 CStyle::Format::Format(const Format& f) {
00040     m_BGColor = f.m_BGColor;
00041     m_FGColor = f.m_FGColor;
00042     m_alignment = f.m_alignment;
00043     m_font = f.m_font;
00044     m_hasFrame = f.m_hasFrame;          
00045     m_frame = 0;
00046     if (m_hasFrame) {
00047         Frame* newFrame = frame();//create
00048         *newFrame = *f.m_frame; //copy content
00049     }
00050     m_type = f.m_type;
00051 };
00052 
00053 CStyle::Format::~Format(){
00054     delete m_frame;
00055 }

00068 const QColor& CStyle::Format::color( const Color type ) const {
00069     switch (type) {
00070         case Foreground:
00071             return m_FGColor;
00072         case Background:
00073             return m_BGColor;       
00074     };
00075     return Qt::white; //shouldn't be executed
00076 }
00077 
00079 void CStyle::Format::setColor( const Color type, const QColor& newColor ) {
00080     switch (type) {
00081         case Foreground:
00082             m_FGColor = newColor;
00083             break;
00084         case Background:
00085             m_BGColor = newColor;
00086             break;
00087     };
00088 }

00091 CStyle::Format::Frame* const CStyle::Format::frame() {
00092     if (m_hasFrame)
00093         return !m_frame ? (m_frame = new CStyle::Format::Frame) : m_frame;
00094     return 0;
00095 }
00096 
00098 void CStyle::Format::setFrameEnabled( const bool hasFrame ) {
00099     m_hasFrame = hasFrame;
00100     if (!m_hasFrame) {
00101         delete m_frame;
00102         m_frame = 0;
00103     };
00104 }

00117 void CStyle::Format::clearData(){
00118     m_BGColor = Qt::white;
00119     m_FGColor = Qt::black;  
00120     delete m_frame;
00121     m_frame = 0;    
00122     m_hasFrame = false;
00123     m_font = QApplication::font();
00124     m_alignment = Format::Left;
00125 }

00173 CStyle::CStyle() :
00174     m_headerFormat(new Format(CStyle::Header)),
00175     m_descriptionFormat(new Format(CStyle::Description)),
00176     m_moduleTextFormat(new Format(CStyle::ModuleText))
00177 {
00178 
00179     //dummy command to translate names of standard styles
00180     i18n("Standard");
00181 //  i18n("Colored style for larger text portions");
00182     i18n("Black&White for larger text portions");
00183     
00184     m_listViewItem = 0;
00185     m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = true;
00186 
00187     setStyleName( i18n("unknown name") );
00188 };

00190 CStyle::CStyle( const QString filename ) :
00191     m_headerFormat(new Format(CStyle::Header)),
00192     m_descriptionFormat(new Format(CStyle::Description)),
00193     m_moduleTextFormat(new Format(CStyle::ModuleText))
00194 {
00195     m_listViewItem = 0;
00196     m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = true;
00197     
00198     load(filename); 
00199 }

00205 CStyle::Format* const CStyle::formatForType( const CStyle::StyleType type) {
00206     switch (type) {
00207         case Header:
00208             return m_headerFormat;
00209         case Description:
00210             return m_descriptionFormat;     
00211         case ModuleText:
00212             return m_moduleTextFormat;      
00213         default:
00214             return 0;
00215     }
00216 }

00219 const bool CStyle::hasFormatTypeEnabled( const CStyle::StyleType type) const {  
00220     switch (type) {
00221         case Header:
00222             return m_isHeaderFormatEnabled;
00223         case Description:
00224             return m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled;        
00225         case ModuleText:
00226             return m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled;         
00227         default:
00228             return false;
00229     }
00230 }
00231 
00233 void CStyle::setFormatTypeEnabled( const CStyle::StyleType type, const bool setEnabled) {
00234     switch (type) {
00235         case Header:
00236             m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = setEnabled;
00237             break;
00238         
00239         case Description:
00240             m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = setEnabled;      
00241             break;
00242         
00243         case ModuleText:
00244             m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = setEnabled;       
00245             break;
00246         
00247         default:
00248             break;
00249     }
00250 }

00253 QListViewItem* const CStyle::listViewItem( CStyleList* const list ){
00254     if (!list) {
00255         if (!m_listViewItem)
00256             return 0;
00257         else
00258             return m_listViewItem;
00259     }
00260     deleteListViewItem();
00261     m_listViewItem = new QListViewItem( list );
00262     updateListViewItem();   
00263     return m_listViewItem;
00264 }

00278 //  qDebug("CStyle::clearData()");

00280     m_name = QString::null;
00281     m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = true;        
00282 }

00285 void CStyle::updateListViewItem(){
00286 //  qWarning("CStyle::updateListViewItem() for %s", m_name.latin1());
00287     m_listViewItem->setText(0, styleName() );
00288 }

00291 void CStyle::deleteListViewItem(){
00292     delete m_listViewItem;
00293     m_listViewItem = 0;

00297 const bool CStyle::load(const QString& filename){
00310     QFile file(filename);
00311     if (!file.exists()) {
00312         qWarning("file doesn't exist");
00313         return false;
00314     }
00315     
00316     QDomDocument doc;       
00317     if (file.open(IO_ReadOnly)) {   
00318         QTextStream t(&file);
00319         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);        
00320         doc.setContent( t.read() );
00321         file.close();   
00322     }
00323     else {
00324         qWarning("CStyle::load: unable to open file %s", filename.latin1());
00325         return false;
00326     };
00327     
00328   QDomElement document = doc.documentElement();
00329   if(document.tagName() != "BibleTimePrintingStyle") {
00330         qWarning("CProfile::load: Missing BibleTime doc");
00331         return false;
00332     }
00333     if (document.hasAttribute("name")) { //name of the printing style
00334         m_name = document.attribute("name");
00335         if (document.hasAttribute("translate") && document.attribute("translate").toInt()) {
00336             m_name = i18n(m_name.local8Bit()); //standard styles should be translated
00337         }
00338     }
00339     
00340     QDomElement elem = document.firstChild().toElement();
00341     while (!elem.isNull()) {
00342         StyleType type = Unknown;
00343         if (elem.tagName() == "HEADER") {
00344             type = Header;
00345         }
00346         else if (elem.tagName() == "DESCRIPTION") {
00347             type = Description;
00348         }
00349         else if (elem.tagName() == "MODULETEXT") {
00350             type = ModuleText;
00351         }
00352         Format* p = formatForType(type);
00353 
00354         if (!p || type == Unknown)
00355             continue;
00356         
00357         if (elem.hasAttribute("enabled")) {
00358             setFormatTypeEnabled(type, elem.attribute("enabled").toInt());
00359         }
00360         if (elem.hasAttribute("alignment")) {       
00361             const int align = elem.attribute("alignment").toInt();
00362             p->setAlignment( static_cast<Format::Alignment>(align) );
00363         }
00364         
00365         QDomElement object = elem.namedItem("COLORS").toElement();
00366         if (!object.isNull()) {
00367             if (object.hasAttribute("bgcolor"))
00368                 p->setColor(Format::Background, QColor(object.attribute("bgcolor")));
00369             if (object.hasAttribute("fgcolor"))
00370                 p->setColor(Format::Foreground, QColor(object.attribute("fgcolor")));               
00371         }
00372 
00373         object = elem.namedItem("FONT").toElement();
00374         if (!object.isNull()) {
00375             QString family = object.hasAttribute("family") ? object.attribute("family") : QApplication::font().family();
00376             unsigned int size = object.hasAttribute("pointsize") ? object.attribute("pointsize").toInt() : QApplication::font().pointSize();
00377             const int weight = object.hasAttribute("weight") ? object.attribute("weight").toInt() : QFont::Normal;
00378             const bool italic = object.hasAttribute("italic") ? static_cast<bool>(object.attribute("italic").toInt()) : false;
00379             
00380             if (family.isEmpty())
00381                 family = QApplication::font().family();
00382             if (!size)
00383                 size = QApplication::font().pointSize();
00384             
00385             p->setFont( QFont(family, size, weight, italic) );          
00386         }   
00387 
00388         object = elem.namedItem("FRAME").toElement();
00389         if (!object.isNull()) { //frame-section exists
00390             const bool enabled = object.hasAttribute("enabled") ? object.attribute("enabled").toInt() : false;          
00391             p->setFrameEnabled(enabled);
00392             if (Format::Frame* frame = p->frame()) {
00393                 const QColor color = object.hasAttribute("color") ? QColor(object.attribute("color")) : Qt::white;
00394                 Qt::PenStyle style = object.hasAttribute("style") ? static_cast<Qt::PenStyle>(object.attribute("style").toInt()) : Qt::SolidLine;
00395                 const int thickness = object.hasAttribute("thickness") ? object.attribute("thickness").toInt() : 1;         
00396                 
00397                 frame->setColor(color);
00398                 frame->setLineStyle(style);
00399                 frame->setThickness(thickness);
00400             }
00401         }
00402         elem = elem.nextSibling().toElement();  
00403     }
00404     return true;
00405 }
00406 
00407 const bool CStyle::save( const QString& filename ){
00408 /* Saved file should look like this:
00409 
00410  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE DOC >
00411  <BibleTimePrintingStyle syntaxVersion="1" name="Standard" translate="1">
00412   <HEADER enabled="1" alignment="center">
00413     <COLORS bgcolor="black" fgcolor="white">
00414     <FONT family="Arial" charset="2" pointsize="10" weight="1" italic="0">
00415     <FRAME enabled="1" color="blue" style="1" thickness="2">
00416   </HEADER>
00417   // same for DESCRIPTION and MODULETEXT
00418 
00419  </BibleTimePrintingStyle>
00420 */
00421     bool ret = false;
00422     
00423   QDomDocument doc("DOC");
00424   doc.appendChild( doc.createProcessingInstruction( "xml", "version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"" ) );
00425 
00426   QDomElement content = doc.createElement("BibleTimePrintingStyle");
00427   content.setAttribute("syntaxVersion", CURRENT_SYNTAX_VERSION);
00428   content.setAttribute("name", m_name);
00429   content.setAttribute("translate", 0); //don't trabslate styles except of prinstalled ones
00430   doc.appendChild(content);
00431 
00432   for (unsigned int i = Header; i <= ModuleText; ++i) {
00433         QDomElement elem;
00434             
00435         const StyleType type = static_cast<StyleType>(i);
00436         switch (type) {
00437             case Header:
00438                 elem = doc.createElement("HEADER");
00439                 break;
00440             case Description:
00441                 elem = doc.createElement("DESCRIPTION");            
00442                 break;
00443             case ModuleText:
00444                 elem = doc.createElement("MODULETEXT");
00445                 break;
00446             default:
00447                 break;
00448         };      
00449         if (elem.isNull()) //shouldn't happen
00450             continue;
00451         content.appendChild(elem);
00452             
00453         Format* format = formatForType(type);           
00454         
00455         elem.setAttribute("enabled", hasFormatTypeEnabled(type));
00456         elem.setAttribute("alignment", static_cast<int>(format->alignment()));
00457         
00458         QDomElement object = doc.createElement("COLORS");
00459         object.setAttribute("bgcolor", format->color(Format::Background).name());
00460         object.setAttribute("fgcolor", format->color(Format::Foreground).name());
00461         elem.appendChild(object);       
00462                 
00463         QFont font = format->font();
00464         object = doc.createElement("FONT");
00465         object.setAttribute("family", font.family());
00466         object.setAttribute("pointsize", font.pointSize());     
00467         object.setAttribute("weight", font.weight());
00468         object.setAttribute("italic", font.italic());
00469         elem.appendChild(object);
00470                         
00471         object = doc.createElement("FRAME");        
00472         Format::Frame* frame = format->frame();
00473         object.setAttribute("enabled", static_cast<bool>(frame) );
00474         if (frame) {
00475             object.setAttribute("color", frame->color().name());
00476             object.setAttribute("thickness", frame->thickness());
00477             object.setAttribute("style", static_cast<int>(frame->lineStyle()) );
00478     }       
00479         elem.appendChild(object);
00480   };
00481   ret = false;
00482 
00483 
00484     QFile file(filename);
00485     if (file.open(IO_WriteOnly)) {
00486         ret = true;
00487         QTextStream t( &file );        // use a text stream
00488         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);
00489         t << doc.toString();
00490         file.close();
00491     }
00492     return ret;
00493 }
